info.title: ViewDNS
info.description: Your one source for DNS related tools! dns, info, reverse ip, pagerank, portscan, port scan, lookup, records, whois, ipwhois, dnstools, web hosting, hosting, traceroute, dns report, dnsreport, ip location, ip location finder, spam, spam database, dnsbl, propagation, dns propagation checker, checker, china, chinese, firewall, great firewall, is my site down, is site down, site down, down, dns propagate

get.description: Used to find the abuse contact address for a domain name. This is where you would send complaints about spam originating from that domain.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: the domain name to find the abuse contact for

get.description: Checks whether a site is blocked by the Great Firewall of China. This test checks across a number of servers from various locations in mainland China to determine if access to the site provided is possible from behind the Great Firewall of China.   This test checks for symptoms of DNS poisoning, one of the more common methods used by the Chinese government to block access to websites.

Check whether recent changes to DNS entries have propagated to DNS servers all over the world. Useful in troubleshooting DNS issues that appear to be isolated to one geographic region. Provides a status report on DNS propagation globally.
View all configured DNS records (A, MX, CNAME etc.) for a specified domain name.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: the domain name to lookup DNS records for

parameters.name: recordtype
parameters.description: the type of DNS record you wish to retrieve (default 'ANY')

get.description: Find out if a domain name provides free email addresses. Search is performed on a custom made list of thousands of known free email hosts.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: the domain name to test for free email services

get.description: This tool will display geographic information about a supplied IP address including city, country, latitude, longitude and more.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: the ip address to find the location of

get.description: Test if any website is accessible using the Internet in Iran in real-time.
This tool will display the name of the company that manufactured a specific network device based on its MAC Address.
Test how long a response from remote system takes to reach the ViewDNS server. Useful for detecting latency issues on network connections.

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: the domain or IP address to perform a ping on

get.description: This web based port scanner will test whether common ports are open on a server. Useful in determining if a specific service (e.g. HTTP) is up or down on a specific server.   Ports scanned are: 21, 22, 23, 25, 80, 110, 139, 143, 445, 1433, 1521, 3306 and 3389

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: the host to perform the port scanner on (domain or IP address)

get.description: Find the reverse DNS entry (PTR) for a given IP. This is generally the server or host name.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: the IP address to retrieve the reverse DNS record for

get.description: Find out if your mail server is listed in any spam databases.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: the IP address to test for spam blacklisting

get.description: Determines the series of servers that data traverses from the ViewDNS server to the specified domain name or IP address.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: the domain or IP address to perform a traceroute on

get.description: Displays owner/contact information for a domain name. Can also be used to determine if a domain name is registered or not.  This tool is not available to free API key users. Access is restricted to paid API keys only.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: the domain to perform a whois lookup on
